description:
Shaved down to just the essentials, the Fly harness is designed for mountain adventures where every gram counts. It's swapped out regular buckles for a sliding toggle on the waistbelt and knotted cord and girth hitch on the leg loops for reliable security without the weight. When you need to drop more weight, remove the foam padding for a 30g saving. Plenty of gear loops give you racking and gear sorting options.

  • Ultralight FuseFrame technology has removeable foam so you can customize comfort levels and weight
  • High-modulus polyethylene attachment points, webbing and gear loops are highly abrasion resistant
  • Buckle-free construction keeps weight down. The harness uses a sliding toggle and girth hitches to adjust size
  • Removing comfort foam drops the weight by 30g
  • 2 gear loops and 4 additional loops keep your gear organized
  • Each leg loop features an ice-screw holder with silicone interior for quick access
  • Harness can be donned while wearing skis or crampons
  • Protective carry bag included
name: Petzl Fly Harness - Unisex
